Class PetController

java.lang.Object
com.demo.pet.controllers.PetController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/pets") public class PetController extends Object
REST controller for managing pet-related operations in the Pet Clinic system.

Exposes endpoints for CRUD operations and retrieval of pets by user.

See info about Controllers Overview: Controllers Overview

See info about Controller Annotations: Controller Annotation

Since:
1.0
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getAllPets

      @PreAuthorize("hasRole('ADMIN') or hasRole('STAFF')") @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PetDTO>> getAllPets()
      Retrieves all pets in the system.

      Only accessible by users with ADMIN or STAFF roles.

      Returns:
      a list of all pets

    • getPetById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> getPetById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Retrieves a pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet to retrieve
      Returns:
      the pet with the specified ID

    • getPetsByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PetDTO>> getPetsByUserId(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Retrieves all pets owned by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose pets are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of pets owned by the specified user

    • addPet

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> addPet(@RequestBody PetDTO petDTO)
      Adds a new pet to the system.

      Only accessible by users with ADMIN or STAFF roles.

      Parameters:
      petDTO - the data transfer object containing pet details
      Returns:
      the added pet

    • updatePet

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> updatePet(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody PetDTO petDTO)
      Updates an existing pet's details.

      Only accessible by users with ADMIN or STAFF roles.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet to update
      petDTO - the data transfer object containing updated pet details
      Returns:
      the updated pet

    • deletePet

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> deletePet(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes a pet from the system.

      Only accessible by users with ADMIN or STAFF roles.

      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pet to delete
      Returns:
      the deleted pet

    • getMyPets

      @GetMapping("/my-pets") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PetDTO>> getMyPets()
      Retrieves the pets owned by the currently authenticated user.
      Returns:
      a list of pets owned by the current user
